flawed_nl_solution:
Billy's age is 30/3 = <<30/3=10>>10 years old.
The sum of the ages of Billy and Lucas is 30/2 = <<30/2=51>>51.
So, Lucas is 51 - 10 = <<51-10=41>>41 years old now.
Therefore, Lucas will be 41 + 3 = <<41+3=44>>44 years old three years from now.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
